reviews.review: Puzzles desafiantes, ótimos personagens e uma história sensacional! Um dos melhores jogos que eu tive o prazer de jogar. 10/10.

One of the best games I've played and that's not just hype based on other reviews. It holds up all the way to 2021. Great from start to finish.
V社的游戏真的用心，GLaDOS，那个johnson执行长，卡洛琳都让我印象深刻。虽然定位是个解谜游戏还让人头晕，但是我真的非常喜欢这个剧情，一代二代都非常喜欢，二代最后的报告还是让GLaDOS用歌来表达。只能说花最少的钱玩最屌的游戏。

Classic platforming puzzler, doesn't get old

Sem dúvida uma sequência excepcional! Os personagens me ganharam ainda mais por aprofundar o backstory (principalmente a GLaDOS). Os puzzles são ainda mais desafiadores, com problemas que me deixaram frustrado por um tempo, mas é só observar o "todo" que se encontra a solução. Sem contar a experiência Coop, a qual ainda não testei, mas já sei que muito divertida. Portal 2 vale cada centavo ^^
super cool concept.  nothing else like it... very addictive and Steve Merchant's voice over is A+
Put@ que pariu, esse jogo é muito bom, slk, quem nn jogou tem que jogar, se você ta vivendo sem jogar esse jogo, ta jogando sua vida fora.
fantastic 3-D puzle game it makes you really use your head, i just completed it id rate both this and the first one 10/10 would play again

A co-op puzzle game where you are a survivor who has to work their way through puzzles made by an artificial intelligence using just your wits and a PORTAL GUN. You can play 1 OR 2 players to figure out theses puzzles. 
Graphics- Good
Soundtrack- Descent
Audience- Teenagers
Difficulty- Decent difficulty
Story- descent story
Game time- good length
Price- Its not too expensive, but it's always on sale
8.5/10

Багато що вже було сказано про цю гру. Чудовий сюжет, пророблені механіки та інше. Також чудовий кооп.
Рекомендую.
Amazing puzzles and an all around fantastic game.

Oyunda çok fazla durunca mide bulantısı, baş ağrısı başlıyor :D. Tek sıkıntılı yönü bazı yerlerde çok küçük gösteriliyor portal açılacak yerler onları farkedene kadar dakikalarınızı harcayabilirsiniz. Birinci oyunu oynamadan ilk olarak bu oyunu oynamanızı tavsiye etmem. Hikaye bakımından ilk oyunu oynamadan da belki anlayabilirsiniz fakat bulmaca tüyoları için birinci oyunu oynamak gerek. Henüz co-op oynamadım o yüzden çok fazla bilmiyorum ama daha yeni bitirdiğim için direkt co-op'a da girişmem.
Сломал не только свою голову, но и голову своего друга об стол. Приятной игры!!!
здесь всё прекрасно. А если ещё есть друг, будет ещё круче. Жалко совместный режим короткий, проходиться за часов 10+- если вы не гении. покупайте не пожалеете.
If you haven't yet, buy this game (and the first one) and play them yourself. Truly a masterpiece. The ending is still, in my opinion, the best in all of video game history.

i like this game i reccomend it to others but if you do not half portal one get it first i beat portal and portal 2 in the end you portal to the moon and then whetley goes in to space and then you get pulled in to glados'es layer and the you get told some stuff by glados and the you go up to the surfes andin the meantime you get a song sung to you by the turrets and then get kicked ou of a shed and then they give you a companyon cube and the very end you see a counter strike global offensive map but it is a very good game

Thanks Valve for making my most memorial game.

j.k It's the best puzzle-platformer ever made, buy it.

Might be the greatest sequel in history. SO many more levels, SO many more characters, SO much more backstory, and it even has co-op! Normally sequels just build off of the first game (I don't deny that this does too) but this doesn't build. It completely overshadows it. The first game was a pure classic, but this takes Portal into the modern era. The graphics are impeccable, showing you the full capabilities that Valve brings to the table. There are so many more voice actors, fully immersing you in a way that Portal never could. And the twist. Ah, the twist. To quote Jack Black, "A good story has a beginning. A middle. And the Twist." I never saw it coming. There is also so much more raw, delicious plot! An unlikely partnership, a painful backstab, and again, a beautifully-written song at the end. I recommend that all players of Portal and Half-Life should IMMEDIATELY get this game and play RIGHT NOW! But not just for Portal and Half-Life players. ALL gamers should put this on their wishlist, if they haven't already.

If you haven't played this before, seriously, don't hesitate, just buy this game. You won't regret it.

I can honestly say this is easily one of the best games ever made. Hours of fun, even for a casual like me. You'll keep coming back to it every now and then to admire it. Even the story was incredible, and all of the one-liners in this game (and there are A LOT) make me laugh every single time.
